TopicTitle: My first post as a free man.

Articles.Content: I finished my final presentation for my major merely hours ago, and with that, I have fulfilled all requirements for graduation from my college! My graduation is tommorow! This means more time for Kerbal, and is generally a great achievement. I am so happy! And Exhausted!

Congratulations!

I'm still stuck in secondary school

Congrats! What did you major in?

Congratulations!

I'm still stuck in secondary school

Quite a pain, although because I'm doing subjects 4 years ahead of me I get to do university subjects in year 11 & 12! Which means I get to graduate faster, which means for more kerbal! Yay!

Congrats! What did you major in?

Quite a pain, although because I'm doing subjects 4 years ahead of me I get to do university subjects in year 11 & 12! Which means I get to graduate faster, which means for more kerbal! Yay!

Sometimes it's a pain in the ass to be a 14 years old . Well... 3 more years and i can go to the college, and after that, i will be a freeman (unless i get inprisoned in the way (?)

Congratulations!

I'm still stuck in secondary school

Your time will come, it will fly by!

Congrats! What did you major in?

Thanks! Major was global and international studies and Spanish

Quite a pain, although because I'm doing subjects 4 years ahead of me I get to do university subjects in year 11 & 12! Which means I get to graduate faster, which means for more kerbal! Yay!

Congrats man!! I love how your first thought for after graduation is KSP!!

I'm very glad KSP didn't exist while I was at uni, or I would have failed!

Congratulations, welcome to unemployment.

Thankfully there is KSP to fill your off time.
good on ya! ive got 4 weeks left in secondary school before a 2 and a half month break. and then i begin a game design course! so excited.

good on ya! ive got 4 weeks left in secondary school before a 2 and a half month break. and then i begin a game design course! so excited.

Is game designing too hard? I'm planning to enter in a game design course too.
Enjoy your youth! It's even harder to play once you have a job and commitments.

On the subject of school, my friend makes a D and he is happy. I make the only B out of the whole year and I'm pissed off

Only a few weeks left till Junior High Graduation

I'm nearly done with my major too. Network engineering.

No idea where I'll go from there. Presumably work up the chain of occupations. I assume that's how it works.
Graduation is the day after you complete the requirements? How do they know that you've actually passed?

I believe 'complete the requirements' is when the instructor of the last required class posts the grade. It's all automated these days. Which is unfortunate, you can't really ask a professor to allow you to skip a prerequisite and take a class you know you can take. It's very binary with the browser based signup system, at least with my college. It's so stupid, I had to take Basic Keyboarding I in order to take PC Configuration and Repair down the line.

Congrats, it is a great feeling, I know. There is not a whole lot more satisfying than achieving ones goal.

You will be truly free when you pay off the debt (assuming you racked it up)

Yeah I have to agree, I plan on getting into game design someday (only in 8th grade now so I have a while) and it is crazy the amount of useless garbage they want you to take to get where you want. I am just going to stop now or I might end up with a 3 page long rant (thanks school!)
Thanks everyone! I just took a well-deserved nap and will do anything but homework now, woot!!
May I ask what you are getting your degree in?
Finished university this week too! But i still got 2 years ahead of me... Well for now i got 4 months of relaxation

May I ask what you are getting your degree in?

Global and International Studies, Spanish
Congrats! I'm glad I wasn't playing KSP when I finished up my academic education, I surely would have failed as spectacularly as my early rocket designs...
